title: Executive Order 5739-Power-Site Restoration No. 464, Idaho
content: So much of the orders of February 25, 1910, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 117, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 117, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 3 S., R. 1 E., sec. 21, W. ½ NE. ¼, N ½ SE. ¼, SE. ¼ SE. ¼;
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5739-Power-Site Restoration No. 464, Idaho Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361391
